sn24.1:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane.
sn24.1:1.3_0: “kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.1:1.4_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti?
sn24.1:2.2_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn24.1:2.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn24.1:3.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.1:3.2_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’ti.
sn24.1:3.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.1:3.7_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’ti.
sn24.1:3.11_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.1:3.13_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.1:3.14_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti?
sn24.1:4.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.1:4.8_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.1:4.9_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti?
sn24.1:4.11_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.1:4.13_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.1:4.15_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.1:4.16_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti?
sn24.1:5.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.1:5.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.2:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.2:1.5_0: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.2:1.10_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.2:2.9_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.2:2.12_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.2:2.14_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.2:2.16_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.2:3.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.2:3.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.3:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.3:1.3_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’”ti?
sn24.3:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.3:2.2_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn24.3:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.3:2.7_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn24.3:3.4_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.3:3.13_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.3:3.17_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.3:3.19_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.3:3.20_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’”ti?
sn24.3:4.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.3:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.4:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:1.3_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?

sn24.4:2.2_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.

sn24.4:2.7_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.

sn24.4:3.5_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?

sn24.4:3.17_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.18_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:4.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.4:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.5:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.5:1.3_9: natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṁ parañca lokaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedenti.
sn24.5:1.4_0: Cātumahābhūtiko ayaṁ puriso yadā kālaṁ karoti pathavī pathavīkāyaṁ anupeti anupagacchati,
sn24.5:1.11_0: Tesaṁ tucchaṁ musā vilāpo ye keci atthikavādaṁ vadanti.
sn24.5:1.12_0: Bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.5:2.3_0: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.5:2.7_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.5:2.9_0: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.5:3.4_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.5:3.6_0: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:3.13_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.5:3.15_0: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:3.17_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.5:3.19_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.5:3.22_0: bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.5:4.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.5:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.6:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.6:1.3_0: ‘karoto kārayato chindato chedāpayato pacato pācāpayato socato socāpayato kilamato kilamāpayato phandato
sn24.6:1.3_1: phandāpayato pāṇamatipātayato adinnaṁ ādiyato sandhiṁ chindato nillopaṁ harato ekāgārikaṁ karoto paripanthe
sn24.6:1.3_2: tiṭṭhato paradāraṁ gacchato musā bhaṇato karoto na karīyati pāpaṁ.
sn24.6:1.4_0: Khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissā pathaviyā pāṇe ekamaṁsakhalaṁ ekamaṁsapuñjaṁ kareyya,
sn24.6:1.5_1: hananto ghātento chindanto chedāpento pacanto pācento,
sn24.6:1.7_0: Dānena damena saṁyamena saccavajjena natthi puññaṁ natthi puññassa āgamo’”ti.
sn24.6:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.6:2.7_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.6:3.4_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.6:3.13_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.6:3.17_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.6:3.19_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.6:4.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.6:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.7:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.7:1.5_0: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
sn24.7:1.7_0: Natthi balaṁ natthi vīriyaṁ natthi purisathāmo natthi purisaparakkamo.
sn24.7:1.8_0: Sabbe sattā sabbe pāṇā sabbe bhūtā sabbe jīvā avasā abalā avīriyā niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatā chasvevābhijātīsu sukhadukkhaṁ paṭisaṁvedentī’”ti?
sn24.7:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.7:2.7_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.7:3.4_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.7:3.13_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.7:3.17_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.7:3.19_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.7:4.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.7:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.8:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.8:1.3_0: ‘sattime kāyā akaṭā, akaṭavidhā, animmitā, animmātā, vañjhā, kūṭaṭṭhā, esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā;
sn24.8:1.4_3: nālaṁ aññamaññassa sukhāya vā dukkhāya vā sukhadukkhāya vā.
sn24.8:1.6_0: Pathavīkāyo, āpokāyo, tejokāyo, vāyokāyo, sukhe, dukkhe, jīve sattame.
sn24.8:1.7_0: Ime satta kāyā akaṭā, akaṭavidhā, animmitā, animmātā, vañjhā, kūṭaṭṭhā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā;
sn24.8:1.8_3: nālaṁ aññamaññassa sukhāya vā dukkhāya vā sukhadukkhāya vā.
sn24.8:1.9_0: Yopi tiṇhena satthena sīsaṁ chindati, na sopi kañci jīvitā voropeti;
sn24.8:1.11_0: Cuddasa kho panimāni yonipamukhasatasahassāni saṭṭhi ca satāni cha ca satāni pañca ca kammuno satāni pañca ca kammāni,
sn24.8:1.11_25: yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karissanti.
sn24.8:1.12_0: Tattha natthi imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā aparipakkaṁ vā kammaṁ paripācessāmi;
sn24.8:1.13_0: paripakkaṁ vā kammaṁ phussa phussa byantīkarissāmīti hevaṁ natthi doṇamite sukhadukkhe pariyantakate saṁsāre,
sn24.8:1.14_0: Seyyathāpi nāma suttaguḷe khitte nibbeṭhiyamānameva paleti;
sn24.8:1.15_0: evameva bāle ca paṇḍite ca nibbeṭhiyamānā sukhadukkhaṁ palentī’”ti?
sn24.8:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.8:2.7_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.8:3.4_0: “yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.8:3.8_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?

sn24.8:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.

sn24.17:1.3_0: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.18:1.3_0: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.18:2.2_0: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti …pe….
sn24.18:3.4_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:3.5_0: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:3.7_0: “Yampidaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññātaṁ pattaṁ pariyesitaṁ anuvicaritaṁ manasā tampi niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.18:3.9_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.18:3.11_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.18:3.12_0: ‘neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.18:4.1_2: ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti,
sn24.18:4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn24.18:5.2_0: so attā no ca me siyā;
sn24.18:6.3_0: Anantavā ca taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīranti,
sn24.18:7.3_0: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti.
sn24.19:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.19:1.3_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā,

sn24.19:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.19:3.4_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya—
sn24.19:3.7_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.19:3.14_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya
sn24.19:3.17_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.19:3.18_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā,

sn24.36:1.3_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?

sn24.36:2.2_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.7_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.36:3.4_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.5_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:3.7_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.8_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:3.14_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.15_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:3.17_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.18_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.37:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.37:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.37:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.37:3.1_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.37:3.3_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.37:3.6_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.37:3.10_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.38:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.39:1.2_0: “Rūpī ca arūpī ca attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā”ti …pe….
sn24.40:1.1_0: “Neva rūpī nārūpī attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā”ti …pe….
sn24.44:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.44:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.44:3.1_0: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ niccaṁ vā aniccaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.44:3.3_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.44:3.6_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.44:3.13_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.44:3.16_0: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.44:6.1_0: Rūpī attā hoti arūpī ca attā hoti,
sn24.44:6.2_0: Rūpī ca arūpī ca attā hoti;
sn24.45:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.45:1.3_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti?
sn24.45:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati—
sn24.45:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.45:3.4_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.45:3.8_0: Tasmiṁ sati, tadupādāya, evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.45:3.9_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti.
sn24.45:3.15_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.45:3.19_0: Tasmiṁ sati, tadupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.70:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.70:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.70:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.70:3.4_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.70:3.8_0: Tasmiṁ sati, tadupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.70:3.15_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.70:3.19_0: Tasmiṁ sati, tadupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.71:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.71:1.3_3: na candimasūriyā udenti vā apenti vā esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitā’”ti?
sn24.71:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.71:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.71:2.11_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.71:2.13_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn24.71:2.21_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.71:2.23_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn24.71:3.1_2: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā,
sn24.71:3.1_3: oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn24.71:3.1_7: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn24.71:3.5_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn24.71:3.5_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn24.96:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.96:2.1_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.96:2.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.96:3.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.96:3.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn24.96:3.14_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn24.96:3.16_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn24.96:4.1_2: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn24.96:4.1_6: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn24.96:4.5_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā,
sn24.96:4.5_1: oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn24.96:4.5_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn24.96:5.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn24.96:5.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
